snippet: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras railed against other leaders for not providing a safe alternative for the thousands trying to reach the Continent in rickety boats across treacherous seas.
abstract: Greek Prime Min Alexis Tsipras criticizes Europe for its anemic response to migrant crisis in wake of reports that at least 22 people have drowned in two shipwrecks in Aegean Sea in past week.

keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: Prime Minister Alexis Tsipras railed against other leaders for not providing a safe alternative for the thousands trying to reach the Continent in rickety boats across treacherous seas.

headline.print_headline: Greek Premier Assails Europe’s Response to Migrant Crisis After More Drownings
headline.main: Greek Premier Condemns Europe’s Response to Migrant Crisis
